greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of compositions of n with equal number of even and odd parts.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
formula: a(n) ~ sqrt(c) * d^n / sqrt(Pi*n), where d = 1.94696532812840456026081823863... is the root of the equation 1-4*d-2*d^2+d^4 = 0, c = 0.225563290820392765554898545739... is the root of the equation 43*c^4-18*c^2+8*c-1=0. - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, May 01 2014
results.author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Sep 24 2004
